mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(login_id,password, name, email, phone) VALUES(#{login_id},#{password},#{name},#{email},#{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM member WHERE login_id = #{login_id} AND password = #{password};
SELECT s.store_id, s.member_id,s.store_name,s.market_tel, s.location, m.name FROM store s, member m WHERE s.member_id = m.member_id AND login_id= #{login_id};
